import React from'react';import siteContent from'../data/siteContent';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeroSection=_ref=>{let{scrollToSection,handleButtonAction}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"home",className:"relative min-h-screen pt-20 bg-cover bg-center flex items-center justify-center",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${siteContent.hero.background})`},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 bg-black opacity-50"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative z-10 text-center px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8 flex justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:siteContent.hero.logo,alt:siteContent.navigation.logo.alt,className:"w-32 h-32 rounded-full border-4 border-yellow-500"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-5xl font-bold mb-6",children:siteContent.hero.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xl mb-8 max-w-2xl mx-auto",children:siteContent.hero.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center space-x-8 mb-8",children:siteContent.hero.social.map((platform,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:platform.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"flex items-center text-white hover:text-yellow-400 transition-colors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:platform.iconPath,alt:platform.platform,className:"w-6 h-6 mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:platform.username})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap justify-center gap-4",children:siteContent.hero.buttons.map((button,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleButtonAction(button),className:getButtonClass(button.type),children:button.text},index))})]})]});};// Helper function for button styling
const getButtonClass=type=>{switch(type){case'primary':return"px-6 py-3 bg-yellow-500 text-gray-900 font-bold rounded-full";case'secondary':return"px-6 py-3 border-2 border-white text-white rounded-full";case'outlined':return"px-6 py-3 border-2 border-yellow-500 text-yellow-500 font-bold rounded-full";default:return"px-6 py-3 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded-full";}};export default HeroSection;
